name: A Re-Bouncing Black Ball Adventure To Infinity And Beyond
name_original: A Re-Bouncing Black Ball Adventure To Infinity And Beyond
description:
You're a black glass ball, that lives in the darkness...

This is probably the hardest game ever created, and it's just the first phase in development.

You can only touch black objects. White object will break your perfect shape.

Beware of moving, falling objects. They bring nothing good.

Enjoy, and have fun.

Try to reach final puzzle in one go.

Compare your score to your friends.
